title: The Perfect Storm
itunes:title: The Perfect Storm
description:
In this episode, Big James introduces the world to his late brother Big Buntry's son, Ace, They also touch on the Dallas police shooting case and the verdict (that launches a argument between Reggie, James & Spider Loc), and the lack of gang structure. Support the show. See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
